attributes.action: Put up street lights and cctv cameras along Shottendane road, Margate.
attributes.additional_details: There is little to no streetlights or cctv along this road, this makes it unsafe during the evening for pedestrians and cyclists and allows drivers to act reckless endangering their lives as well as others. There is also a high amount of crime along this road that goes unnoticed which could be resolved by adding these two simple measures for the safety of the general public .
attributes.background: We want the government to put up cctv and streetlights along shottendane road in Margate due to reckless drivers and high criminal activity in the area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. THis is a matter for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find out how to petition the council here:

https://www.thanet.gov.uk/info-pages/petition-the-council/
